about.description: Aspiring Software Engineer with strong expertise in web and mobile development using technologies like Spring Boot, React, Next.js, Flutter, and Tailwind CSS. Experienced in building scalable applications, including e-learning platforms, management systems, and voting systems. Proficient in DevOps tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and AWS, as well as database management (MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL). Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative team player, seeking a 6-month internship to apply and expand technical skills in a real-world setting.
